sentence: The image is a DVD cover for the film "Jeffrey."
sentence_cn: 图片是电影《Jeffrey》的 DVD 封面。

sentence: The title "Jeffrey" is prominently displayed at the top in large, colorful letters, transitioning from red to blue.
sentence_cn: 标题“Jeffrey”以大而多彩的字母突出显示在顶部，颜色从红色变为蓝色。

sentence: At the top, the names "Steven Weber," "Patrick Stewart," and "Sigourney Weaver" are listed, indicating they are featured in the film.
sentence_cn: 最顶部列出了“史蒂文·韦伯”、“帕特里克·斯图尔特”和“西格妮·韦弗”的名字，表明他们曾在电影中出演。

sentence: Below the title, two men are pictured.
sentence_cn: 标题下方是两名男子的画像。

sentence: One man, dressed formally, looks upwards with his hands raised in an expressive gesture, while another man leans in closer to him, also looking upwards.
sentence_cn: 一名身着正式服装的男子举起双手，目光向上，做出富有表现力的手势，而另一名男子则倾身靠近他，同样目光向上。

sentence: In the lower part of the cover, there are stylized city skyscrapers in blue and red.
sentence_cn: 封面下部是蓝色和红色风格化的城市摩天大楼。

sentence: A tagline in red text reads, "Love is an adventure when one of you is sure... and the other is positive."
sentence_cn: 红色标语写道：“当你们其中一人确信，而另一人积极乐观时，爱情就是一场冒险。”
words: Love is an adventure when one of you is sure... and the other is positive.

sentence: At the bottom, there are various DVD format symbols and a rating symbol marked "15."
sentence_cn: 底部有各种 DVD 格式符号和标有“15”的评级符号。

sentence: The background is mostly dark with a reddish hue, adding to the dramatic effect.
sentence_cn: 背景大部分是深色的，带有淡红色的色调，增强了戏剧效果。
